name: Portal Configuration Wizard
description: Captures the Config Wizard steps for various tasks. FIles required in a version of this component include : db2jcc_license_cu.jar, db2jcc4.jar, filesForDmgr.zip

resPropDefs.name: portal.admin.password
resPropDefs.label: portal.admin.password
resPropDefs.description: This must be defined on the top-level environment as other resources can use it

resPropDefs.name: websphere.password
resPropDefs.label: websphere.password
resPropDefs.description: This must be defined on the top-level environment as other resources can use it

resPropDefs.name: isPrimaryNode
resPropDefs.label: isPrimaryNode
resPropDefs.description: Whether node is the primary node in a cluster

resPropDefs.name: portal.server.name
resPropDefs.label: portal.server.name
resPropDefs.description: Name assigned to the WebSphere portal server

properties.name: WASProfileName
properties.description: Name of the WAS Portal profile

processes.name: Add Additional node to cluster
processes.description: Run on an additional node after installing Portal Binaries only. upload db2jcc4.jar, db2jcc_license_cu.jar to a version of this component

processes.name: Augment Deployment Manager for Portal
processes.description: Run on Dmgr Server - add Portal files to Dmgr. Upload the filesForDmgr.zip from the Primary node to a version of this component

children.name: 91335e9c8e8e14a6db96e86befe7bb
children.text: Ignore error in copy step which occurs if the source and destination are same

processes.name: Create Portal profile on addittional node and copy DB2 drivers
processes.description: Run on an additional node after running ConfigEngine enable-profiles package-profiles on primary

children.name: e35e196fce2b26600cfe75e942d24b
children.text: Install and use Centos unzip as UCD unzip doesn't preserve permissions

processes.name: Create a Cluster
processes.description: Run on first portal server. Federate the node. This node then becomes a managed node in the deployment manager cell.

processes.name: Create clustered profile template on primary node
processes.description: runs ConfigEngine enable-profiles package-profiles and uploades profile template zip to component version

processes.name: Database Transfer DB2 Same Server
processes.description: Executes all the Database Transfer steps when Portal and DB2 on same server

edges.to: Create Port users and groups for DB2

edges.from: Create Port users and groups for DB2

offsets.name: Create Port users and groups for DB2

children.name: Create Port users and groups for DB2

properties.contents:
db2set DB2COMM=TCPIP
db2set DB2_EVALUNCOMMITTED=YES
db2set DB2_INLIST_TO_NLJN=YES
db2 "UPDATE DBM CFG USING sheapthres 0"

	
db2 "CREATE DB ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} using codeset UTF-8 territory us PAGESIZE 8192"
db2 "UPDATE DB CFG FOR ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USING locktimeout 30"

db2 "CONNECT TO ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USER ${p:environment/wcm.DbUser} USING AppleIBM"
db2 "CREATE BUFFERPOOL ICMLSFREQBP4 SIZE 1000 AUTOMATIC PAGESIZE 4K"
db2 "CREATE BUFFERPOOL ICMLSVOLATILEBP4 SIZE 16000 AUTOMATIC PAGESIZE 4K"
db2 "CREATE BUFFERPOOL ICMLSMAINBP32 SIZE 16000 AUTOMATIC PAGESIZE 32K"
db2 "CREATE BUFFERPOOL CMBMAIN4 SIZE 1000 AUTOMATIC PAGESIZE 4K"
db2 "CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE ICMLFQ32 PAGESIZE 32K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSMAINBP32"
db2 "CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE ICMLNF32 PAGESIZE 32K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSMAINBP32"
db2 "CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE ICMVFQ04 PAGESIZE 4K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSVOLATILEBP4"
db2 "CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE ICMSFQ04 PAGESIZE 4K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSFREQBP4"
db2 "CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE CMBINV04 PAGESIZE 4K BUFFERPOOL CMBMAIN4"
db2 "CREATE SYSTEM TEMPORARY TABLESPACE ICMLSSYSTSPACE32 PAGESIZE 32K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSMAINBP32"
db2 "CREATE SYSTEM TEMPORARY TABLESPACE ICMLSSYSTSPACE4 PAGESIZE 4K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSVOLATILEBP4"
db2 "CREATE USER TEMPORARY TABLESPACE ICMLSUSRTSPACE4 PAGESIZE 4K BUFFERPOOL ICMLSVOLATILEBP4"
db2 "DISCONNECT ${p:environment/wcm.DbName}"
db2 "TERMINATE"
db2 "UPDATE DB CFG FOR ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USING logfilsiz 16000"
db2 "UPDATE DB CFG FOR ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USING logprimary 20"
db2 "UPDATE DB CFG FOR ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USING logsecond 50"
db2 "UPDATE DB CFG FOR ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USING logbufsz 500"
db2 "UPDATE DB CFG FOR ${p:environment/wcm.DbName} USING DFT_QUERYOPT 2"

processes.name: Database Transfer remote DB2 01 Setup DB2 JDBC jars backup-property-files-for-dbxfer
processes.description: Run on portal server. Setup DB2 JDBC jars and backup-property-files-for-dbxfer

processes.name: Database Transfer remote DB2 02 setup-database
processes.description: Run on portal server. setup-database. Db2 must be restarted after this step.

processes.name: Database Transfer remote DB2 03 validate transfer grant LOB
processes.description: Run on Portal Server: validate database , transfer database , grant privileges, setup DB2 LOB
